name: Project HVR
description:
A game I had been working on for a few months at the end of last year before I completely lost motivation due to feature creep, bugs etc. I didn't want to leave it just sitting on my computer like many of my other project so I thought I would upload this as a reminder of what I once created.

Development of this game has been cancelled indefinitely. 

Perhaps one day I'll come back.

SOUND IS ACCIDENTALLY OFF BY DEFAULT. GO TO OPTIONS AND JUST CLICK RESET TO DEFAULT
